title: Thread Metadata
description: The thread metadata object contains a number of thread-specific channel fields that are not needed by other channel types.

auto_archive_duration.description: duration in minutes to automatically archive the thread after recent activity, can be set to: 60, 1440, 4320, 10080

archive_timestamp.description: timestamp when the thread's archive status was last changed, used for calculating recent activity

locked.description: OPTIONAL: whether the thread is locked; when a thread is locked, only users with MANAGE_THREADS can unarchive it
